title: Question:
author: myfairwin
content: Hello everyone!I am working on a Flappy Bird Multiplayer Play2Earn Game.Quite simple, yet challenging game, so far all needed rights reserved and ready for marketing and launch.Since I am now deciding which blockchain to start with, I am asking you guys and girls! The flappy bird game will have several gaming modules:- Single Player / Pay to Play and Win Token- Multiplayer / Challenge random online Players and Win TokenTokens can be bought via DEX & spent on the website. Tokens can then also be withdrawn via website.The game is super addictive, and so is winning. If you are interested in the project, join us at https://t.me/bnb_pumps

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: I am excited. Do message me privately if you are interested in marketing.

comments.author: cryptopher1
comments.body: Good idea but you need a detailed whitepaper something we've been doing since 2017 with utmost success. We would love to extend our services to your project at an affordable rate. See samples via links below if they pick your interest and would want the same kindly do reach out via email contact@coinweez.com or add on Telegram @ICO_Services we would love to help. Samples1.https://www.memusic.io/documents/deck_v2.1.2.pdf2.https://www.theunfettered.io/the-unfettered-whitepaper.pdf3. https://aurus.io/aurus-whitepaper.pdf4.https://watchskins.com/images/media/WatchSkins_Whitepaper_3.4.2.pdf5.https://gokumarket.com/assets/whitepaper/GokuMarket%20Whitepaper.pdf6.https://www.farm2kitchen.io/downloads/f2kwhitepaper.pdf
